bibl.title: The Provenance of Egyptian Documents from the 8th Century BC till the 8th Century AD.
bibl.note: Introduction. - Trismegistos. - Geographical distribution of the languages. - Geographical distribution of the papyri. - Geographical distribution of the ostraca. - Geographical distribution of the mummy labels. - Geographical distribution of the texts in the Leuven Database of Ancient Books. - Geographical distribution of the magical texts.
bibl.seg: VERRETH Herbert, The Provenance of Egyptian Documents from the 8th Century BC till the 8th Century AD. (Trismegistos Online Publications. III.)
Köln - Leuven, Trismegistos, 2009, 314 pp. ISBN 978-94-9060-402-8. [Uniquement accessible en ligne, en téléchargement gratuit: < http://www.trismegistos.org/top.php >.]

Introduction. - Trismegistos. - Geographical distribution of the languages. - Geographical distribution of the papyri. - Geographical distribution of the ostraca. - Geographical distribution of the mummy labels. - Geographical distribution of the texts in the Leuven Database of Ancient Books. - Geographical distribution of the magical texts.
